content: We agreed to discuss country specific profiles at checkpoint 2, Tuesday at 8 AM US Central time (15:00 Central European Time). The lessons learned from MedMij, for instance. At least @Sam Echevarria and @Michael van der Zel will have something to share. Right?
@Oliver Egger this would be a good opportunity to discuss the Swiss profiles too. Are you able to attend?
@Mikael Rinnetmäki thanks, i have at 3pm the questionnaire track welcome meeting, i will try to join after the welcome track is over and see if you are still around

We used https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/Using+the+FHIR+Validator#UsingtheFHIRValidator-ComparingProfiles to compare the IPA IG to the MedMij IG. During the Connectathon we found that the comparator did not compare the cardinalities. @Grahame Grieve fixed this in the 5.6.23 version of the validator. Thanks Grahame!
